indicatorTemplateXML.author: Colcamex Resources Inc. for Oscar EMR

heading.name: Smoking Status properly recorded
heading.definition: % of patients >= 12 years old for whom smoking status is recorded
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from AFHTO D2D 3.0 Indicators: Data Dictionary version 4 (Nov 2015)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS SMOKERS IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.smkp IS NOT NULL OR fin.smkm IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Status Recorded",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS WITH NON-SMOKING NOTATIONS. IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.smkp IS NULL AND fin.smkm IS NULL, 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Not Recorded"
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, SMKP.refused AS smkp, SMKM.dataField AS smkm FROM demographic d
-- Notations for Smokers in Preventions LEFT JOIN( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${smokerprevention} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) SMKP ON (SMKP.demographic_no = d.demographic_no)
-- Notations for Smokers in Measurements LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${smokermeasurement} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id) ) SMKM ON (d.demographic_no = SMKM.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) / 365.25 ) ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) fin

column.name: CASE WHEN SMKP.refused = 0 OR SMKM.dataField LIKE '%yes%' THEN 'current' WHEN SMKP.refused = 2 OR SMKM.dataField LIKE '%x%' THEN 'former' WHEN SMKP.refused = 1 OR SMKM.dataField LIKE '%no%' THEN 'non' ELSE 0 END
column.title: Smoking Status

column.name: CASE WHEN SMKM.dateObserved IS NOT NULL THEN SMKM.dateObserved WHEN SMKP.prevention_date IS NOT NULL THEN SMKP.prevention_date ELSE 0 END

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d
-- Notations for Smokers in Preventions LEFT JOIN( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.refused, p.prevention_date FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${smokerprevention} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.demographic_no) > -1 ) SMKP ON (SMKP.demographic_no = d.demographic_no)
-- Notations for Smokers in Measurements LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${smokermeasurement} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id) ) SMKM ON (d.demographic_no = SMKM.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) / 365.25 ) ) >= ${lowerLimit.age}
